Reviews.Title: good smartphone with WM6.5
Reviews.Author: Adrian Moralez
Reviews.Content: I had this phone for a little over an year until I lost it :(but I can say that this is an excellent phone, simple and straight... you got your weather updates, email, sms, contacts, internet, applications and very customizable.  You got office programs, opera, and the marketplace where you can buy your apps. The most I liked of this phone is the ability to multi-task, have many programs opened and be able to switch between them, although it would consume memory but still useful.One of the things I did quite like is that the sound isn't high and that it doesn't support many video format and the video capturing quality and photo is not the best from all smartphones, but still "okay".

Reviews.Title: Bad, very bad
Reviews.Author: Xinia Brenes
Reviews.Content: I bought two of this item, and receive another model of phone, despite confirming by phone that would receive the correct item.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Quad-Band Unlocked GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 GSM and 900/2100 3G frequencies plus GPRS/EDGE capabilities
Powered by Windows Mobile 6.5 Professional Platform, Qualcomm MSM7225, 528 MHz Processor, microSD memory card, 3.5 mm audio jack
2.8-inch TFT-LCD touch-sensitive screen with QVGA resolution, GPS navigation, Wi-Fi networking (802.11b/g), 3.2 megapixel digital camera, A2DP Bluetooth for stereo music
Up to 7 hours of talk time, up to 500 hours (20 days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: HTC T3333 Touch2 Unlocked Phone with 3MP Camera, WiFi and GPS--International Version with Warranty (Black)
